hero.description: ENS provides smart digital menu solutions for restaurants and cafés using QR codes, allowing your customers to browse, order, and pay easily — creating a smooth experience that boosts satisfaction and increases sales.
hero.subtitle: Turn your restaurant menu into a fast and easy digital experience
hero.trust: No commissions • Fast setup • Continuous support

trustedBy.title: Trusted by restaurants and hospitality businesses

features.title: Features of
features.description: ENS provides the best digital menu solutions through QR codes, allowing you to receive orders and payments from your customers while delivering the best possible experience.

items.title: Custom Branding
items.description: Design your digital presence by changing colors, logos, and cover images, and link the digital menu to your social media accounts.

items.title: Advanced Reports & Analytics
items.description: Get accurate data and reports that help you understand your business performance and identify opportunities for improvement.

items.title: Payment Processing
items.description: Receive orders and payments easily by connecting your digital menu to your POS system for a smooth and fast experience.

items.title: Easy Control Panel
items.description: Manage orders, branches, and real-time updates through a simple and flexible interface, with the ability to add multiple users.

items.title: Independent Branch Management
items.description: Control each branch separately, add or edit products freely, and track sales easily.

items.title: Increase Revenue
items.description: Reduce reliance on costly delivery apps and receive orders directly through your own platform without commissions.

items.title: 24/7 Technical Support
items.description: We provide continuous technical support around the clock to ensure you get help whenever you need it.

items.title: Multi-Language Support
items.description: Translate the menu into multiple languages to serve all your customers from different nationalities.

whyUs.title: Why choose ENS?
items: Suitable for all restaurants and cafés
Instant updates with no extra cost

howItWorks.title: Create a Digital Menu with
howItWorks.description: With a few simple steps, you can create an interactive menu that reflects your brand and makes ordering and payment easier for your customers.

steps.title: Choose a Package
steps.description: Create your account and select the package that best fits your business needs.

steps.title: Add Your Items
steps.description: Send us your menu and we’ll design a digital interactive menu. You can add or remove items anytime.

steps.title: Share & Receive Orders
steps.description: Share the menu with your customers and start receiving orders and payments easily.

pricing.title: Choose the Right
pricing.description: Select the package that suits your restaurant needs

contact.description: Book your consultation with ENS and create a digital menu that inspires customers and increases sales.
contact.successDescription: Your information has been received successfully. We’ll contact you shortly.
contact.note: We’ll reach out shortly to understand your restaurant’s needs

footer.description: ENS provides smart digital menu solutions for restaurants and cafés using QR codes for a smooth ordering experience.

templates.pageSubtitle: Choose the perfect template for your restaurant
